vertex.lhs: Subs(f1(x)*f2(x), x, b) - Subs(f1(x)*f2(x), x, a) + Subs(Integral(f1(x)*Derivative(f2(x), x)), x, b) - Subs(Integral(f1(x)*Derivative(f2(x), x)), x, a)
vertex.rhs: Subs(Integral(f2(x)*Derivative(f1(x), x), x), x, b) - Subs(Integral(f2(x)*Derivative(f1(x), x), x), x, a)

vertex.lhs: Subs(f1(x)*f2(x), x, b) - Subs(f1(x)*f2(x), x, a) - Integral(f1(x)*Derivative(f2(x), x), (x, a, b))

meta.desc: integration by parts with definite integrals
